description:

Blossom Crush Legend is new and exciting game from a team of top hit game app makers. It is an addictive mania match 3 and match 4 game! Blast the blossom flower buds after line them up and enjoy the very addictive splash and most interesting match-three casual puzzle game! It is also a brand new amazing popping simulator game, completely free, without in-app-purchase! Blast your way through beautiful gardens full of sweet buds! Link the buds to bloom and strike the flowerbeds star before you run out of moves!
Flowers to bloom needs Sunshine, Water & Fertilizer! 3 Boosters are available as secret tool to help you complete each mission given in this garden galaxy. Link 3 or more candy buds of the same block to blast them. Simply enjoy & don’t jam your brain to solve each saga mission. Watch as you set off an epic chain reaction of blooming flowers candies in the garden paradise. Wish you luck to enjoy the victory!

How to play:
1. Line & Match three or more same identical candy flower to crush for points.
2. Match until reaching the saga mission for each level. Don’t jam your mind and take your time to solve the mission in less move.
3. Use secret tool (boosters) with points to reach your goal.
3. When 4 flower buds are aligned, you will get a special tulip which clear all in the same line horizontally or horizontally or surrounding 4x4 frozen candy flowers.
4. When 5 are matched, it will create a blossom flower which remove all of that same candy.
5. When sweets are linked like T or L characters, you will have a fire that explode twice and clear the surrounding 4x4.
6. Combine 2 special tulips together to make a super powerful blast. Eliminate the more jelly can get extra scores.
7. This is an addictive and delicious adventure filled with colorful jewels style crunching effects with a sweet graphic picture.
8. Login to Facebook to gain 500 coins. Those coins collected can get the boosters or moves!
9. Complete levels with star to get bonus.
